## **Informações da sessão** {#sessioninfo}

<!--script for generating HORIZONTAL LINE-->
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#2C3E50;background-color:#2C3E50">

```{r install, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = "hide"}
if (!require("details", character.only = TRUE, quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("details", character.only = TRUE)
if (!require("sessioninfo", character.only = TRUE, quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("sessioninfo", character.only = TRUE)
```

```{r session-info, echo = FALSE}
sessioninfo::session_info()%>%
  details::details(
    summary = 'Current session info',
    open = TRUE
  )
```
